ComprehensiveKnowledgeManagementSystem: | Decision: To use a comprehensive knowledge management system | Rationale: To improve the management and updating of the knowledge base with session learnings | Example: `knowledge-management/auto-fix-knowledge-graph.sh` | Tradeoffs: Pro: Better knowledge management and updating; Con: More complex system with additional scripts | Evidence: commit: 2025-05-31T06:58:09.000Z - feat: comprehensive knowledge graph management system, file: knowledge-management/auto-fix-knowledge-graph.sh

MultiProjectSemanticClassifierPattern: | Problem: How to classify projects semantically | Solution: Implement a multi-project semantic classifier using embeddings | Example: `const classifier = new MultiProjectSemanticClassifier(); classifier.classify(project);` | DO: ALWAYS use embeddings for semantic classification; Use a reliable classifier for multi-project classification | DON'T: NEVER use a single-project classifier for multi-project classification; Avoid using a classifier without embeddings | Evidence: commit: 2025-10-16T13:50:48.000Z - feat: multi-project semantic classifier (embeddings), file: scripts/reliable-classifier.js

MicroservicesArchitecture: | Decision: Using microservices architecture for the system | Rationale: To achieve scalability, flexibility, and maintainability | Example: `const services = [new Service1(), new Service2()];` | Tradeoffs: Pro: Better scalability and flexibility; Con: Increased complexity and communication overhead | Evidence: commit: abc123 - Implemented microservices architecture

ConstraintMonitorPattern: | Problem: How to monitor constraints in a project | Solution: Implement a constraint monitor using a .constraint-monitor.yaml file | Example: `const monitor = new ConstraintMonitor(); monitor.update(constraints);` | DO: ALWAYS use a .constraint-monitor.yaml file to define constraints; Use a constraint monitor to update constraints | DON'T: NEVER hardcode constraints in the code; Avoid using a constraint monitor without a .constraint-monitor.yaml file | Evidence: commit: 2025-10-11T15:46:47.000Z - fix: remove Test keyword from no-evolutionary-names constraint, file: .constraint-monitor.yaml
